dict.acceptation: 主；领主；上帝；（英国用以称呼法官、主教或某些男性贵族成员，表示尊敬）大人；

sent.orig: The Lord gives, the Lord takes away. Blessed be the name of the Lord.
sent.trans: 赏赐的是耶和华，收取的是耶和华，耶和华的名是应当称颂的。

sent.orig: O house of Levi, bless the Lord; You who revere the Lord, bless the Lord.
sent.trans: 诗135:20利未家阿、们要称颂耶和华．们敬畏耶和华的、称颂耶和华。

sent.orig: So they obeyed the word the LORD and again, as the LORD had ordered.
sent.trans: 众人就听从耶和华的话，遵着耶和华的命回去了。

sent.orig: Ascribe to the LORD, O mighty ones, ascribe to the LORD glory and strength.
sent.trans: 神的众子阿，你们要将荣耀能力，归给耶和华。归给耶和华。

sent.orig: The Lord hath heard my supplication; the Lord will receive my prayer.
sent.trans: 诗6:9耶和华听了我的恳求．耶和华必收纳我的祷告。
